byline.contributor: Ivan Nechepurenko and Oleg Matsnev contributed reporting.

abstract: Chechen leader Ramzan A Kadyrov takes cue from Donald Trump, starring in reality contest show The Team, which airs on Russian state television and is similar to Trump's The Apprentice; hopes to promote investment in Chechnya while remaking his own image, which he says liberals have tarnished.

headline.print_headline: Chechen Warlord’s Cuddly Makeover, With a Nod to Trump
headline.main: A Warlord’s Cuddly Makeover, With a Nod to Donald Trump

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: In a reality TV show modeled on “The Apprentice,” Chechnya’s leader, Ramzan A. Kadyrov, is trying to change an image that “I will kill whoever says anything about me.”...
lead_paragraph: In a reality TV show modeled on “The Apprentice,” Chechnya’s leader, Ramzan A. Kadyrov, is trying to change an image that “I will kill whoever says anything about me.”
